queries.query:
from(bucket: "myo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fv_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "fv0" or r["_field"] == "fv1" or r["_field"] == "fv2" or r["_field"] == "fv3" or r["_field"] == "fv4" or r["_field"] == "fv5" or r["_field"] == "fv6" or r["_field"] == "fv7")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dl-myo/examples/influx_client")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "myo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "imu_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "orientation.w" or r["_field"] == "orientation.x" or r["_field"] == "orientation.y" or r["_field"] == "orientation.z")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dl-myo/examples/influx_client")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "myo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "emg_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "emg0" or r["_field"] == "emg1" or r["_field"] == "emg2" or r["_field"] == "emg3" or r["_field"] == "emg5" or r["_field"] == "emg4" or r["_field"] == "emg6" or r["_field"] == "emg7")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dl-myo/examples/influx_client")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "myo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "imu_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "gyroscope.0" or r["_field"] == "gyroscope.1" or r["_field"] == "gyroscope.2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dl-myo/examples/influx_client")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "myo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "imu_data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "accelerometer.0" or r["_field"] == "accelerometer.1" or r["_field"] == "accelerometer.2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["source"] == "dl-myo/examples/influx_client")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
